title: Knitbone Pepper Ghost Dog: Best Friends Forever
description: Knitbone has a problem. His beloved owner Winnie and her bonkers parents may be forced to move and leave Knitbone behind! Can the spirits of Starcross, a gigglesome gang of ghostly animals, help Winnie save her home?A wonderfully whimsical new series, jam-packed with mayhem, chuckles and woofs!
author: Claire Barker
